properties.description: Additional properties associated with the abstract.
Additional properties associated with the member.
Additional properties associated with the concept.

name.description: QName that uniquely identifies the cube object.

cubeType.description: QName identifying the type of data cube being represented.

cubeDimensions.description: Ordered set of cubeDimension objects used on the cube.

domainName.description: QName of the domain object associated with the dimension.

typedSort.description: Sort order for typed dimension (asc or desc).

allowDomainFacts.description: If facts not identified with the dimension are included in the cube.

periodConstraints.description: Ordered set of periodConstraint objects (only for xbrl:period core dimension).

periodType.description: Indicates if the period is instant or duration.

timeSpan.description: Duration of time using XML duration type.

periodFormat.description: Duration of time with an end date.

conceptName.description: QName of a concept object that has a date fact value.

context.description: QName of a concept object, with optional @end or @start suffix to indicate which date from the context is used.

value.description: A literal date value representing the end date.

timeShift.description: A duration (ISO 8601) string to shift the resolved date.

endDate.description: End date for a duration fact or instant fact (dateResolution object).

conceptName.description: QName of a concept object that has a date fact value.

context.description: QName of a concept object, with optional @end or @start suffix to indicate which date from the context is used.

value.description: A literal date value representing the end date.

timeShift.description: A duration (ISO 8601) string to shift the resolved date.

startDate.description: Start date for a duration fact or instant fact (dateResolution object).

conceptName.description: QName of a concept object that has a date fact value.

context.description: QName of a concept object, with optional @end or @start suffix to indicate which date from the context is used.

value.description: A literal date value representing the end date.

timeShift.description: A duration (ISO 8601) string to shift the resolved date.

onOrAfter.description: Include facts on or after this date (dateResolution object).

conceptName.description: QName of a concept object that has a date fact value.

context.description: QName of a concept object, with optional @end or @start suffix to indicate which date from the context is used.

value.description: A literal date value representing the end date.

timeShift.description: A duration (ISO 8601) string to shift the resolved date.

onOrBefore.description: Include facts before or on this date (dateResolution object).

conceptName.description: QName of a concept object that has a date fact value.

context.description: QName of a concept object, with optional @end or @start suffix to indicate which date from the context is used.

value.description: A literal date value representing the end date.

timeShift.description: A duration (ISO 8601) string to shift the resolved date.

cubeNetworks.description: Ordered set of network object QNames related to the cube.

excludeCubes.description: Ordered set of cube object QNames to be excluded from the cube.

cubeComplete.description: Indicates if all cells in the cube are required to have a value.

properties.description: Additional properties associated with the cube.
Additional properties associated with the dimension.
Additional properties associated with the relationship.
Additional properties associated with the relationship.
Additional properties associated with the label.
Additional properties associated with the label.
Additional properties associated with the label.
Additional properties associated with the label.
Additional properties associated with the label.
Additional properties associated with the label.

relatedName.description: QName that the label is associated with.

properties.description: Additional properties associated with the label.

name.description: QName that uniquely identifies the reference object.

extendTargetName.description: QName of the reference object to extend.

relatedNames.description: Ordered QNames the reference is associated with.

properties.description: Additional properties associated with the reference.

name.description: QName that uniquely identifies the label type object.

uri.description: URI for backward compatibility with XBRL 2.1 taxonomies.

dataType.description: QName indicating the dataType of the label object value property.

allowedObjects.description: Ordered set of object types that can use the labelType.

name.description: QName that uniquely identifies the reference type object.

uri.description: URI for backward compatibility with XBRL 2.1 taxonomies.

allowedObjects.description: Ordered set of object types that can use the referenceType.

orderedProperties.description: Ordered set of property QNames that can be used with the reference.

requiredProperties.description: Ordered set of property QNames that must be included within a defined reference type.

name.description: QName that uniquely identifies the cube type object.

baseCubeType.description: Base cube type that the cube object is based on. Uses the QName of a cubeType object.

periodDimension.description: Indicates if the period core dimension is included in the cube. Defaults to true.

entityDimension.description: Indicates if the entity core dimension is included in the cube. Defaults to true.

unitDimension.description: Indicates if the unit core dimension is included in the cube. Defaults to true.

taxonomyDefinedDimension.description: Indicates if taxonomy defined dimensions are included in the cube. Defaults to true.

allowedCubeDimensions.description: Ordered set of allowedCubeDimension objects permitted to be used on the cube.

dimensionName.description: Dimension QName that identifies the taxonomy defined dimension.

dimensionType.description: Indicates that the cube must have a typed or explicit dimension.

dimensionDataType.description: Data type of the typed dimension.

required.description: True if the defined dimension is required on the cube. Defaults to false.

requiredCubeRelationships.description: Ordered set of requiredCubeRelationship objects that must be associated with the cube.

relationshipTypeName.description: Relationship type QName of a relationship. Required.

source.description: QName of the source object type in the relationship.

target.description: QName of the target object type in the relationship.

name.description: QName that uniquely identifies the datatype object.

baseType.description: QName that uniquely identifies the base datatype the datatype is based on.

enumeration.description: Ordered set of enumerated values of the datatype if applicable.

minInclusive.description: Decimal value for minimum inclusive cardinal value (applies to float, double, decimal).

maxInclusive.description: Decimal value for maximum inclusive cardinal value (applies to float, double, decimal).

minExclusive.description: Decimal value for minimum exclusive cardinal value (applies to float, double, decimal).

maxExclusive.description: Decimal value for maximum exclusive cardinal value (applies to float, double, decimal).

totalDigits.description: Total digits of a value (applies to float, double, decimal).

fractionDigits.description: Digits to the right of the decimal place (applies to float, double, decimal).

minLength.description: Minimum length of a string value.

maxLength.description: Maximum length of a string value.

whiteSpace.description: Whitespace handling: preserve, replace, or collapse.

patterns.description: Array of regex patterns (XML regex). At least one must match.

unitTypes.description: UnitType object defining numerator, denominator, and multiplier datatypes.

name.description: QName that uniquely identifies the data table object.

cubeName.description: QName that identifies the cube associated with the data table.

showRefs.description: Indicates if column and row references are shown on the table.

name.description: QName that uniquely identifies the transform object.

inputDataType.description: QName indicating the datatype of the input to be transformed.

outputDataType.description: QName indicating the datatype of the output after transformation.

dimensionNames.description: Axis dimension objects that define the dimensions associated with the axis.

axisLabels.description: Set of strings used as axis labels. Cannot be used with presentationNetwork.

presentationNetwork.description: QName identifying a parentChild network for order and labels. Only allowed if a single dimension is used.

dimensionName.description: QName of a dimension defined by the cubeName property.

showTotal.description: Indicates if the total of the dimension is shown in the axis.

showAncestorColumns.description: Members on an explicit dimension that are not leaf values included on the axis.

totalLocation.description: Indicates if the total is at the start or end when shown on the axis.

periodAlign.description: Used with the period dimension to align time values. Values: '@start', '@end'.
